properties.NAME: Westminster Recycling Drop-Off Location
properties.FACILITY: Neighbourhood : smaller size facility to service population of 10,000 or less
properties.FACILITY_F: De voisinage : petite installation assurant des services à 10 000 résidents ou moins.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: All materials collected at the drop-off locations are also collected curbside by licensed trash collectors. Curbside trash collectors are required to offer your recycling services.

properties.NAME: Eco-Cycle CHaRM: Center for Hard-to-Recycle Materials
properties.FACILITY: Community: mid size facility to service population of 40,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: Communautaire : installation de taille moyenne assurant des services à 40 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The Boulder County Recycling Center, operated by Eco-Cycle, has completed major upgrades. That means the publicly-owned facility now accepts more types of plastics for recycling -- something the public has been requesting for a long time!

properties.NAME: Broomfield Recycling Center
properties.FACILITY: Community : mid size facility to service population of 40,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: Communautaire : installation de taille moyenne assurant des services à 40 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Broomfield continues to evaluate methods to reduce operational cost and protect the environment at the Broomfield Recycling and Education Center. To simplify operations at the center, there are only five bins to use for your recyclables.

properties.NAME: Tree Limb Recycling
properties.FACILITY: Metcalfe Community Centre - Roving Skateboard Park Location
properties.FACILITY_F: Centre communautaire de Metcalfe - Lieu de planchodrome itinérant
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Now open year round on the second Saturday of the month, from 8 a.m. to noon.

properties.NAME: Denver Arapahoe Disposal Site (DADS) Landfill
properties.FACILITY: Johnny Leroux Stittsville Community Arena - Roving Skateboard Park Location
properties.FACILITY_F: Aréna communautaire de Stittsville Johnny-Leroux - Lieu de planchodrome itinérant
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Denver Arapahoe Disposal Site (DADS) is a regional subtitle D facility that provides safe and convenient disposal services for communities, businesses and industries serving Denver Metro and surrounding areas.

properties.NAME: Douglas County Community Recycling
properties.FACILITY: District: larger facility to service population of 100,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: De district : grande installation assurant des services à 100 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: 11901 Newlin Gulch Road, Parker, CO 80134.

properties.NAME: Central Facilities Station
properties.FACILITY: Neighbourhood : smaller size facility to service population of 10,000 or less
properties.FACILITY_F: De voisinage : petite installation assurant des services à 10 000 résidents ou moins.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The facility was recently upgraded to install single stream recycling bins and new signage. Common recyclables, such as cardboard, plastic, glass, and paper all go in the same container. No separation is necessary. This facility also has used cooking oil drums and clothing recycling bins.

properties.NAME: Quail Street Recycling Center
properties.FACILITY: Neighbourhood : smaller size facility to service population of 10,000 or less
properties.FACILITY_F: De voisinage : petite installation assurant des services à 10 000 résidents ou moins.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The Quail Street Recycling Center accepts sorted cardboard, aluminum beverage cans, scrap metal, glass jars and bottles, paper and certain types of plastics.

properties.NAME: Rooney Road Recycling Center
properties.FACILITY: Fitzroy Harbour Community Centre - Roving Skateboard Park Location
properties.FACILITY_F: Centre communautaire de Fitzroy Harbour - Lieu de planchodrome itinérant
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The Rooney Road Recycling Center recycles household chemicals and wastes (for example, items you wouldn't want kids to get into) and electronics.

properties.NAME: IT Liquidators
properties.FACILITY: Walter Baker Sports Centre - Roving Skateboard Park Location
properties.FACILITY_F: Centre sportif Walter-Baker - Lieu de planchodrome itinérant
properties.DESCRIPTIO: When equipment can no longer be refurbished, IT Liquidators makes sure that equipment is ethically, legally and safely recycled.  We uphold the highest recycling standards, requiring that all non-remarketable equipment is recycled responsibly.

properties.NAME: Styrofoam Corral
properties.FACILITY: Osgoode Community Centre - Roving Skateboard Park Location
properties.FACILITY_F: Centre communautaire d'Osgoode - Lieu de planchodrome itinérant
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Styrofoam/Polystyrene.  Must be white, unprinted and clean, with no tape or other packing materials. Please bag smaller pieces. No packing peanuts, please!

properties.NAME: Thornton Solid Waste-Recycling
properties.NOTES: Outdoor (Commemoratively named Charlie Bowins Skateboard Park on June 10, 2015)
properties.FACILITY: District: larger facility to service population of 100,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: De district : grande installation assurant des services à 100 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: ​The Environmental Services Team provides curbside trash and recycling collection services to over 29,000 homes in the City, as well as a number of other collection services for our citizens.

properties.NAME: All Recycling Inc.
properties.FACILITY: Neighbourhood : smaller size facility to service population of 10,000 or less
properties.FACILITY_F: De voisinage : petite installation assurant des services à 10 000 résidents ou moins.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: All Recycling Inc. is one of the largest most efficient scrap facilities in the Rocky Mountain Region. Our outstanding long-term relationships with mills, foundries and consumers worldwide mean better, more consistent prices for our customers.

properties.NAME: A1 Organics Mountain States
properties.FACILITY: Neighbourhood : smaller size facility to service population of 10,000 or less
properties.FACILITY_F: De voisinage : petite installation assurant des services à 10 000 résidents ou moins.
properties.DESCRIPTIO: A1 Organics is family-owned and operated since 1974. We provide home gardens, commercial landscapers, agriculturalists, municipalities, and institutions with organic composts, soils, mulches, and organics recycling services. Originally located in Eaton, we've expanded to serve more clients and now operate out of Eaton CO, Keenesburg CO, Commerce City CO, and Englewood, CO.
